instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00239 touch on touchbar not working.
threads.message:
The board was "checked" by other technician and there was overheat on touchbar's touch flex componentes (under metallic protection.) and touchbar wasnt working at all. I bought touchbars and now touchbar gives image but touch is not working. Checked J442 and seems to be ok. 

Checked J4402 for an kind of short to ground (with board off) and there is no short. Seems that touch is managed by U3900, is that right? What can i check?

threads.title: 820-00239 touch on touchbar not working.
threads.message:
You must check basic signals and voltages at J4402, with Touchbar connected.
Pins 1, 2, 15,18, 20, 21, 22.
Also check all SPI TERM resistors from page 42.

threads.title: 820-00239 touch on touchbar not working.
threads.message:
Pin1 - 1.76V
Pin 2 - 0.37V
Pin 15 - 0V
Pin 18 - 0.17V (R4481 is ok and there is 1.8V on other side)
Pin 20/21 - 1.8
Pin 22 - 5.1V


changed q4400 and now get 5V on Pin 2 and 1.8 on pin 18. BUT there is problem. I think T2 is "protecting" mac and now mac is asking for critical update to continue working, when try to update it gives me error . I can only boot in safe mode but touch not working (no image). Already tried reinstall but no changes

Have you faced that before?

threads.title: 820-00239 touch on touchbar not working.
threads.message:
We have several threads on the forum about this issue.
Disconnect webcam and try again.

threads.title: 820-00239 touch on touchbar not working.
threads.message:
I am trying all that with board out and with externel display. 

You mean webcam from lcd assembly board?


Anyway before repair when i start mac with board out it was taking much less time to arrive login display. Now it can easily take about 3-5 minutes.

threads.title: 820-00239 touch on touchbar not working.
threads.message: Do you still get the critical update error?

threads.title: 820-00239 touch on touchbar not working.
threads.message: Yes, only can start in safe mode

threads.title: 820-00239 touch on touchbar not working.
threads.message: Did you try all the steps mentioned in dukefawks post???

threads.title: 820-00239 touch on touchbar not working.
threads.message: Got it, thanks. Will try it on monday

threads.title: 820-00239 touch on touchbar not working.
threads.message:
I checked it and disconnected touchbar, camara, touch id and same result.

The problem now is that i dont get even image on touchbar. I cheked J4401  and seems ok. Than i saw that L4401 was moved (probably by me when was working on Q4400. Repaired it and get about 0.4V on  both sides.

Couple days ago i repaired machine with same issue, and there was touchbar problem. Once i solved it ( some small components it started normally.


2INformaticos What i must check for J4401 to check why i am not getting image on touchbar?



P.S. Just reinstalled completly clean version of 10.15 and same result. So i guess there must be something wrong with touchbar touch or image lines on logic board?

threads.title: 820-00239 touch on touchbar not working.
threads.message:
Check DFR_DISP_RESET_L, 3V3 and 1V8 at J4401.
Be sure L4400/01 not broken.
